BPOT General Rating Decision Requirements
In order to properly document decisions based on BPOT exposure in Veterans Benefits Management System-Rating (VBMS-R), claims processors must use a combination of applicable system-generated language, analysis fragments, and glossary text fragments to adequately explain the basis of all decisions.
If awarding or denying a claim for presumptive SC based on BPOT exposure, apply the following guidelines:
cite the applicable regulatory or statutory authority for the decision, when applicable
list favorable findings, if applicable, specific to the facts of the case, and
assign the appropriate special issue and special issue basis to each decided issue.
